text: Ot (Ѿ ѿ; italics: Ѿ ѿ) is a letter of the Cyrillic alphabet. Even though it is a combination of the letters Omega (Ѡ, ѡ) and Te (Т, т), it is a separate letter of the alphabet, placed between х and ц. This can be seen in the first printed Cyrillic page, and continues in modern usage. Category:Cyrillic letters
title: Ot (Cyrillic)
